trans-unit.source: Represents a control that enables a user to select a date by using a visual calendar display.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo que permite que um utilizador selecionar uma data utilizando uma apresentação visual de calendário.

trans-unit.source: A Calendar control can be used on its own, or as a drop-down part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> control.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo de calendário pode ser utilizado no seu próprio, ou como parte da lista pendente um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Calendar supports only the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O calendário suporta apenas o calendário gregoriano.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the Calendar.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte fornece informações sobre as tarefas associadas, normalmente, o calendário.

trans-unit.source: |Task|Implementation| |----------|--------------------| |Have the Calendar display a month, an entire year, or a decade.|Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> property to Month, Year, or Decade.| |Specify whether the user can select a date, a range of dates, or multiple ranges of dates.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>.| |Specify dates that cannot be selected.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates%2A> property.| |Specify the range of dates that the Calendar displays.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.| |Specify whether the current date is highlighted.|Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Tarefa | Implementação | |----------|--------------------| | Tem calendário apresentar um mês, um ano completo ou uma decade. | Defina a propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>mês, ano ou Decade. | | Especifique se o utilizador pode seleccionar uma data, um intervalo de datas ou vários intervalos de datas. | Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>. | | Especifique as datas que não pode ser selecionado. | Utilize a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates%2A>. | | Especifique o intervalo de datas que apresenta o calendário. | Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>e propriedades de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>. | | Especifique se a data atual é realçada. | Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> is `true`.| |Change the size of the Calendar.|Use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> or set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, é <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A> `true`. | | Altere o tamanho do calendário. | Utilizar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox>ou defina a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> properties of a Calendar, the actual calendar does not change its size.| The Calendar control provides basic navigation using either the mouse or keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que se definir o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>Propriedades de um calendário, calendário real não alterar o respetivo tamanho. | O controlo de calendário fornece navegação básica utilizando o rato ou o teclado.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte resume a navegação do teclado.

trans-unit.source: |Key Combination|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>|Action| |---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| |ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>.| |ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Combinação de chave | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>| Ação | |---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| | SETA | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera a propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>não está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>. | | SETA | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o mês do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que não se altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | SETA | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o ano de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |SHIFT+ARROW|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>, extends the range of selected dates.| |HOME|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> to the first day of the current month.| |HOME|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the first month of the year.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que não se altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | SHIFT + SETA PARA A | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>não estiver definido como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>, expande o intervalo de datas selecionados. | | HOME PAGE | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>para o primeiro dia do mês atual. | | HOME PAGE | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o mês do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>para o primeiro mês do ano.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |HOME|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the first year of the decade.
trans-unit.target: Não alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | HOME PAGE | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o ano do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>para o ano primeiro do decade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |END|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> to the last day of the current month.| |END|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the last month of the year.
trans-unit.target: Não alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | FIM | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>para o último dia do mês atual. | | FIM | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o mês do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>para o último mês do ano.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |END|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the last year of the decade.
trans-unit.target: Não alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | FIM | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Altera o ano do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>o último ano do decade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.| |CTRL+UP ARROW|Any|Switches to the next larger <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Não alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>. | | SETA PARA CIMA + CTRL | Qualquer | Muda para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> maior seguinte</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> is already <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, no action.| |CTRL+DOWN ARROW|Any|Switches to the next smaller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se já se encontra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, nenhuma ação. | | SETA PARA BAIXO DE CTRL + | Qualquer | Muda para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> menor seguinte</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> is already <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, no action.| |SPACEBAR or ENTER|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>|Switches <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> represented by focused item.| ## Customizing the Calendar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Calendar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se já se encontra <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>, nenhuma ação. | | Barra de espaço ou ENTER | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>| Comutadores <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode>representado pelo item focada. | # # Personalizar o calendário de controlo para aplicar as mesmas definições de propriedade para vários controlos de calendário, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar a predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para lhe dar controlo um aspeto exclusivo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Calendar, see [Calendar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver as partes e Estados que são específicos para o calendário, consulte [estilos de calendário e os modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controlo podem ser definidas pelo estilo de predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo predefinido, a propriedade poderá alterar o valor predefinido do quando o controlo é apresentado na aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo predefinido é determinado pelo qual tema de ambiente de trabalho é utilizado quando a aplicação está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [predefinido o WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Calendar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Definir uma propriedade visual apenas terá um efeito se essa propriedade ambos presentes no modelo do controlo de calendário predefinido e é definida através da utilização de um.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Pode encontrar uma lista de propriedades visuais na secção "Alterar o Visual estrutura de um controlo" [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de elemento do objeto de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um conjunto de datas que estão marcados como não seleccionável.

trans-unit.source: Dates in this collection will appear gray and crossed out on the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Datas nesta coleção aparecerá cinzento e ultrapassados terminar no calendário.

trans-unit.source: To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A> method provided by the collection returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: Para que todos os anteriores datas não selecionável, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>método fornecido pela coleção devolvida por esta propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* One or more object elements of type .
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de elemento de propriedade de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* um ou mais elementos de objeto do tipo .

trans-unit.source: A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de datas que não pode ser selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> associated with the control's internal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> associados do controlo interno <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *resourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *resourceExtension* um dos seguintes: `StaticResource` ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [XAML recursos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: *styleResourceKey* The key that identifies the resource being requested.
trans-unit.target: *styleResourceKey* a chave que identifica o recurso que está a ser solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a um recurso existente no <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.CalendarItemStyle*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.CalendarItemStyle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date to display.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data para apresentar.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayDate and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> properties specify what the calendar displays and what has focus within the calendar.
trans-unit.target: O DisplayDate e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>Propriedades de especificar o que apresenta o calendário e que tem o foco no calendário.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> only when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> is set to Month, but the user might change the DisplayDate when the Calendar is in Year and Decade mode.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>apenas quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>está definido para o mês, mas o utilizador pode alterar o DisplayDate quando o calendário estiver em modo de ano e Decade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the mode changes the DisplayDate.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte descreve a forma como o modo de alterações a DisplayDate.

trans-unit.source: |DisplayMode|Action| |-----------------|------------| |Month|DisplayDate changes when the user navigates to a different month.| |Year|The month of DisplayDate changes when the user clicks or navigates to a different month.| |Decade|The year of DisplayDate changes when the user clicks or navigates to another year.| DisplayDate is ignored if its value is outside of the range of dates that is specified by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: | DisplayMode | Ação | |-----------------|------------| | Mês | DisplayDate é alterada quando o utilizador navega para um mês diferentes. | | Ano | O mês do DisplayDate alterada quando o utilizador clica ou navega para um mês diferentes. | | Decade | O ano de DisplayDate alterada quando o utilizador clica ou navega para outro ano. | DisplayDate é ignorada se o valor está fora do intervalo de datas especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **verdadeiro**|| # # Utilização de atributos de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *dateTimeString* uma data que seja dos formatos que está listada no [DateTime XAML sintaxe](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tópico.

trans-unit.source: The date to display.
trans-unit.target: A data para apresentar.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.Today%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.DateTime.Today%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*>propriedade é alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate*>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> is assigned its new value.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre após <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>é atribuído ao respectivo valor novo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last date in the date range that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a última data no intervalo de datas que está disponível no calendário.

trans-unit.source: You can restrict the range of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and DisplayDateEnd properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode restringir o intervalo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>e propriedades de DisplayDateEnd.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador não é possível deslocar para ou selecione datas fora deste intervalo.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to a date that is after DisplayDateEnd, DisplayDateEnd is set to the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>propriedade para uma data que é depois DisplayDateEnd, DisplayDateEnd está definido para o mesmo valor que <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.

trans-unit.source: The last date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: A última data que está disponível no calendário.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a primeira data que está disponível no calendário.

trans-unit.source: You can restrict the range of a Calendar by setting the DisplayDateStart and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode restringir o intervalo de um calendário definindo a DisplayDateStart e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador não é possível deslocar para ou selecione datas fora deste intervalo.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to a date that is before DisplayDateStart, DisplayDateStart is set to the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>propriedade para uma data que seja antes DisplayDateStart, DisplayDateStart está definido para o mesmo valor que <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.

trans-unit.source: The first date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: A primeira data que está disponível no calendário.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the calendar displays a month, year, or decade.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o calendário apresenta um mês, ano ou decade.

trans-unit.source: A Calendar can display a month, a year, or a decade.
trans-unit.target: Um calendário pode apresentar um mês, ano ou um decade.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how the user navigates to each mode.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista como o utilizador navega para cada modo.

trans-unit.source: |DisplayMode|Action| |-----------------|------------| |Month|To navigate to Year mode, click the month heading.| |Year|To navigate to Decade mode, click the year heading.
trans-unit.target: | DisplayMode | Ação | |-----------------|------------| | Mês | Para navegar para o modo de ano, clique no cabeçalho de mês. | | Ano | Para navegar para o modo de Decade, clique no cabeçalho de ano.

trans-unit.source: To navigate to Month mode, click one of the displayed months.| |Decade|To navigate to Year mode, click one of the displayed years.| ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**||
trans-unit.target: Para navegar para o modo de mês, clique dos meses apresentados. | | Decade | Para navegar para o modo de ano, clique dos anos apresentados. | # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **verdadeiro**||

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates what length of time the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> should display.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica o período de tempo a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> deve apresentar.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode*>propriedade é alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode*>

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o dia em que é considerado o início da semana.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DayOfWeek> that represents the beginning of the week.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DayOfWeek>que representa o início da semana.</xref:System.DayOfWeek>

trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek*>que é determinado através da cultura atual.</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek*>

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current date is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a data atual é realçada.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current date is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a data atual é realçada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.IsTodayHighlighted*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> control when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: Baseia-se da árvore visual para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"> </xref> controlar quando um novo modelo é aplicado.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é invocado sempre que o código da aplicação ou um processo interno, como reconstruir a passagem de esquema, chama o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"></xref> for use by the [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/add/includes/silverlight-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"> </xref> para utilização pelo [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/add/includes/silverlight-md.md)] infraestrutura de automatização.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> instance if one has not been created for the control instance; otherwise, it returns the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> previously created.
trans-unit.target: Este método cria uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>instância se não tiver sido criada para a instância do controlo; caso contrário, devolve a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>criado anteriormente.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayModeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayModeChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"> </xref> evento encaminhado que ocorre quando o utilizador prime uma chave enquanto este controlo tem foco.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> overrides the OnKeyDown method to support keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>substitui o método de OnKeyDown para suportar a navegação do teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when a keystroke, such as pressing an ARROW key, performs a navigation action.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação marca o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>eventos como processada, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade dos dados de eventos para `true` quando uma tecla, por exemplo, premindo a tecla de seta, efetua uma ação de navegação.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event that occurs when the user releases a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"> </xref> evento encaminhado que ocorre quando o utilizador liberta uma tecla enquanto este controlo tem foco.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A> method to support keyboard navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A>método para suportar a navegação do teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event data.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação não altera o estado processado (o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade) da <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>dados de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O controlo gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged>evento chamando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral de eventos encaminhados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionModeChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionModeChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the currently selected date.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data atualmente selecionada.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|| Use this property when is set to .
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **verdadeiro**|| Utilize esta propriedade quando está definida como .

trans-unit.source: In other modes, this property will always be the first date in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Em outros modos, esta propriedade será sempre a data da primeira no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *dateTimeString* A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *dateTimeString* uma data que seja dos formatos que está listada no [DateTime XAML sintaxe](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tópico.

trans-unit.source: The date currently selected.
trans-unit.target: A data atualmente selecionada.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified date is outside the range specified by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd*> -or- The specified date is in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates*> collection.
trans-unit.target: A data especificada está fora do intervalo especificado pelo <> </> *> e <> </> *> - ou - a data especificada está no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates*>

trans-unit.source: If set to anything other than <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*> is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se definido para algo diferente de <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>está definido como <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of selected dates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um conjunto de datas selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: Dates can be added to the collection either individually or in a range using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Datas podem ser adicionadas à coleção individualmente ou num intervalo com o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property, adding a date or range to the collection may cause it to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo do valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>propriedade, adicionar uma data ou um intervalo para a coleção pode fazer com que a ser limpo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> affects the SelectedDates property.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>afeta a propriedade SelectedDates.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: |CalendarSelectionMode|Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|No selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: | CalendarSelectionMode | Descrição | |---------------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| Não selecione as opções são permitidas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> cannot be set and no values can be added to SelectedDates.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Only a single date can be selected, either by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> or the first value in SelectedDates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>Não é possível definir e não existem valores podem ser adicionados a SelectedDates. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| Apenas uma único data pode ser selecionada, optar por definir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>ou o primeiro valor na SelectedDates.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> cannot be used.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|A single range of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>não pode ser utilizado. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| É possível selecionar um único intervalo de datas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, adding a date individually to SelectedDates, or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will clear all previous values from SelectedDates.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>|Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Definição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, adicionar uma data individualmente para SelectedDates ou utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>limpará todos os valores anteriores do SelectedDates. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode>| Podem selecionar vários intervalos não contíguo de datas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a date individually to SelectedDates or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will not clear SelectedDates.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar uma data individualmente para SelectedDates ou utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>não limpará SelectedDates.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> will still clear SelectedDates, but additional dates or ranges can then be added.
trans-unit.target: Definição <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>ainda limpará SelectedDates, mas, em seguida, podem ser adicionados datas adicionais ou intervalos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.| ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects* One or more object elements.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar um intervalo que inclui algumas as datas em que já estão selecionadas ou sobrepõe-se outro intervalo resulta na União dos intervalos e não irá causar uma exceção. | # # Utilização de elemento de propriedade XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects* um ou mais elementos de objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> object that contains the currently selected dates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém as datas atualmente selecionadas.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a coleção devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates*>propriedade é alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates*>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML``` ```

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged"> </xref> evento encaminhado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates what kind of selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica que tipo de seleções são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the current selection mode.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica o modo de seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*> changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Provides a text representation of the selected date.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma representação de texto da data selecionada.

trans-unit.source: A text representation of the selected date, or an empty string if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação de texto da data selecionada ou uma cadeia vazia se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*>é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate*>
